page.title: 12 Vobster Engineering works.
page.content: On Thursday 4th of July a group of children went to the{Engineering {Works}at Vobster where they make and repair equipment for a large quarry firm. We all talked to the engineering works manager. We saw a piece of tubing being cut. We all saw a big guillotine which was used for cuttig big sheets of metal. We saw a big press.It punches holes into big sheets of metal, for the big bolts to go through.We also saw a man welding tubing together and also men making conveyor belt rollers out of metal and covering them with a rubber substance.There was big{crane}for hauling up big pieces of metal.The main sort of metal they use is{steel. We saw a leg for a hydraulic vehicle being made.We saw tube being made out of a solid pipe.
